Bond_Begin Property

CDXML Name:B
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Bond_Begin
CDX Constant Value:0x0604
Data Size:CDXObjectID
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Bond
First written/read in:ChemDraw 4.0
Required?Required for bonds

Description:

The ID of the CDX node object at the first end of a bond.
